casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James Michael LATHAM, Jr. No. 81P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Brendan O'Donnell, Assistant Public Defender, for Latham, James Michael (Jr.). Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Jennifer Harjo, Attorney at Law, Wilmington. David Jester, Court Reporting Manager

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of March 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Davis, J. recused
